itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor chat about what it's like behind the scenes of a metal festival, what it's like being backstage of your favorite band, and JT puts a Seadoo in his parents pool which turns out horrifically. 

 Pre-order Ross' new book!

When Darkness Falls, He Doesn't Catch It
